---

### **Primary Font Family**
- **Sans‑serif option:** *Source Sans Pro* (clean, open forms, great for on‑screen legibility).  
- **Fallbacks:** *Helvetica Neue / Arial* on systems without the preferred font.  
- **Alternative serif set** (if you prefer textbook look): *Merriweather* / *Georgia* for body copy, paired with *Source Sans Pro* headings.

---

### **Type Size & Hierarchy**
| Level | Font weight | Size (pt) | Line spacing | Notes |
|-------|--------------|-----------|--------------|-------|
| **H1 – Module / Section Title** | semi‑bold | 16 | 1.4× | Uppercase or Small Caps; use top‑of‑page only |
| **H2 – Subheading (Activity Steps, Trainer Tip, etc.)** | bold | 14 | 1.4× | Add 4 pt space above |
| **Body Text** | regular | 11 | 1.6× | Default running copy |
| **Lists & Checklists** | regular | 10.5 | 1.5× | Maintain 4 mm indent; bullet or checkbox glyphs solid black |
| **Call‑out Head (e.g., Trainer Tip)** | italic + small caps | 10 | 1.3× | Set box‑header in **Blue / Green / Orange** color key |
| **Call‑out Body** | regular | 10.5 | 1.5× | 6 mm padding inside colored border |

---

### **Spacing & Margins**
- **Top/bottom margins:** 25 mm / 20 mm.  
- **Side margins:** 22 mm per edge or 18 mm inside for bound print.  
- **Paragraph spacing:** 6 pt after each paragraph; no extra before.  
- **Columns:** Main content 65–70 characters per line; side call‑out column ≈ 25–30 % of page width.

---

### **Additional Accessibility Notes**
- Maintain **minimum contrast ratio 4.5 : 1** between text and background.  
- Use **true bold** (not simulated weight) for emphasis; avoid all‑caps in long strings.  
- For grayscale output, rely on **thick borders** + light shading instead of pure color to distinguish boxes.
